entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%

Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
